item.title: Bag of food dumped by sub station on Blackthorn Grove, 10th July
item.description:

item.title: 2 dangerous trees, 10th July
item.description:
Hi, I manage 19 Curlew for NHG and there are two trees on council land to the rear of the property by the river that seem overgrown and could present a danger in high wind if branches fall (which my resident says has happened earlier in year). Please would it be possible to address or to add to a forthcoming tree program? thanks, Jamie Cole, Notting Hill Genesis, jamie.cole@nhg.org.uk 0203 987 1086

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Garganey Walk, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Next to car park and behind the restaurant, 10th July
item.description:

item.title: Near miss with cars wile walking the dog, 10th July
item.description:
The fire gate at this location has no padlock on it so cars drive up it at speed most days of the week to the jubilee centre weans other members of the public have had NEAR MISSES The gate should be locked as jo fire engine would be able to go up that path anyway

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lytton Strachey Path, Thamesmead, London

item.title: Dog mess on pavement North Cross Road corner of Archdale Road, 10th July
item.description:
Extensive dog mess on pavement outside Old School Buildings on North Cross Road. This is just where the market stalls will be tomorrow morning. Please request urgent clearance. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-7, Archdale Road, East Dulwich, London
